title: WHEN ARE 6.12 CHAMPION POINTS IN ALL MAPS GOING TO BE ON NA?
body: just patched and played a ARAM and 3s and both did not give me champion points, how long til this is resolved or added?

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I don't have any exact ETA's I can give out other than it will happen sometime during this patch.  [Source](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-612-notes#patch-champion-mastery):

>"Champ Mastery’s making its way to Howling Abyss and Twisted Treeline over the course of 6.12!"

There should be an announcement as soon as its live!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=imhRF7cr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-16T00:01:47.655+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, I don't have any exact ETA's I can give out other than it will happen sometime during this patch.  [Source](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-612-notes#patch-champion-mastery):
> 
> There should be an announcement as soon as its live!

The patch notes were extremely unclear on the status of both champ mastery and /remake. I'm pretty sure the majority of players reading the patch notes thought that both those features were already live.
well they do this with skins at least in order to catch any last minute issues or bugs or whatnot. I would reason they do the same thing with these as well. So they can't give you an exact time.

> [{quoted}](name=RottedApples,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=imhRF7cr,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-16T00:49:23.455+0000)
>
> well they do this with skins at least in order to catch any last minute issues or bugs or whatnot. I would reason they do the same thing with these as well. So they can't give you an exact time.

Skins are always very clear that they will be coming out "sometime this patch!" with no other confusing statements.

Also from the patch notes:
"Champ Mastery’s now on all maps."
"testing in NA for around a week before revolving around the world."

When Champ Mastery is not yet on all maps and /remake is not yet being tested on NA.

Not to mention that availability of skins can also be checked in the shop and their presence or absence doesn't actually change what modes people are willing to play.

> [{quoted}](name=Wake n Vape,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=imhRF7cr,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-15T22:34:24.218+0000)
>
> just patched and played a ARAM and 3s and both did not give me champion points, how long til this is resolved or added?

Yeah. The patch notes were worded quite poorly. I logged on for a quick game before work, and after the match everybody in ARAM was pretty much "Where's my rank? Where are my champion points?" All of us logged on to play just for that. BM riot!
